actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.
Reported to House from the Committee on Ways and Means with amendment, H. Rept. 96-567.

official_title: A bill to suspend for a three-year period the duty on pillow buns of latex foam.

summary.text: (Reported to House from the Committee on Ways and Means with amendment, H. Rept. 96-567) Amends the Tariff Schedules of the United States to permit the duty free entry of pillow blanks of latex foam rubber until June 30, 1981.

titles.title: A bill to suspend for a three-year period the duty on pillow buns of latex foam.
